WorkItem.Description:
Looking over the change to TemplateBase for [ThreadStatic] I thought I should check out any derived classes.
I look like that in ITemplateOfT you should make the 'model' field ThreadStatic as well.
Â 
    public abstract class TemplateBase<TModel> : TemplateBase, ITemplate<TModel>
    {
        #region Fields
        [ThreadStatic]
        private object model;
        #endregion

Comments.Message: The instantiation model is changing in v3. We are no longer caching template instances, but rather template types. This means we no longer need [ThreadStatic]
